query:
INSERT INTO courses (
  id,
  title,
  description,
  level,
  framework,
  region,
  duration,
  price,
  price_3month,
  price_6month,
  price_12month,
  modules,
  learning_objectives,
  prerequisites,
  certification_included,
  status,
  created_at,
  updated_at
) VALUES (
  'eu-ai-act-fundamentals-001',
  'EU AI Act Fundamentals',
  'Comprehensive 8-module course covering the EU AI Act regulation. Learn prohibited practices, high-risk AI systems, provider/deployer obligations, transparency requirements, GPAI regulation, governance structure, compliance timeline, and penalties.',
  'fundamentals',
  'eu-ai-act',
  'EU',
  600,
  499.00,
  199.00,
  99.00,
  59.00,
  '[{"id":1,"title":"Introduction to the EU AI Act","duration":45,"contentFile":"eu-ai-act-module-1.md"},{"id":2,"title":"Risk Classification System","duration":45,"contentFile":"eu-ai-act-module-2.md"},{"id":3,"title":"Prohibited AI Practices","duration":60,"contentFile":"eu-ai-act-module-3.md"},{"id":4,"title":"High-Risk AI Systems - Part 1","duration":60,"contentFile":"eu-ai-act-module-4.md"},{"id":5,"title":"High-Risk AI Systems - Part 2","duration":60,"contentFile":"eu-ai-act-module-5.md"},{"id":6,"title":"Provider and Deployer Obligations","duration":60,"contentFile":"eu-ai-act-module-6.md"},{"id":7,"title":"Transparency, GPAI, and Governance","duration":60,"contentFile":"eu-ai-act-module-7.md"},{"id":8,"title":"Compliance Timeline, Penalties, Next Steps","duration":60,"contentFile":"eu-ai-act-module-8.md"}]',
  '["Explain the purpose and scope of the EU AI Act","Classify AI systems by risk level","Identify prohibited AI practices","Recognize all eight high-risk categories","Distinguish between provider and deployer obligations","Apply transparency requirements","Understand GPAI regulation","Navigate compliance timeline","Develop organizational compliance roadmap"]',
  '[]',
  TRUE,
  'active',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
)
